name: aai-motor-speed-tweak-new-recipes
title: AAI Motor Speed Tweak (New AAI Recipes)
author: Jackalope_Gaming, Cheetah7
description: Changes the crafting speeds of motors and electric motors to have better ratios with the rest of the game. Adapted for AAI's revised motor recipes. Original mod by Jackalope_Gaming. Also adds support for "AAI Fast Motor Crafting" mod option.
